summary: This document is an internal email forwarding a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein from someone in a foreign country. The sender notes they do not respond to foreign submissions and instructs the recipient to log the submission.

events.title: Civilian Crime Report Submission Forwarded
events.description: An internal email forwards a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein from a person in a foreign country.

keyFacts: A civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein was received from someone in a foreign country.
The agency's policy is not to respond to submissions from foreign countries.
The email instructs the recipient to make a note in the log about the submission.
The submission is attached as a PDF file named 'nt'l_re_Epstein.pdf'.
